direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle consumers based on the presence or setting of a value.
Setting the value triggers the execution of consumers in both ifPresent and setValue methods.
Both methods involve conditional execution based on the presence of a value and handle consumers.
Both methods involve deferred execution and handle consumers based on the presence of a value.
Both methods involve logging operations related to the presence or setting of a value.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the value is a prerequisite for ifPresent to execute its consumers.
Both methods need to be invoked to ensure the value is set and consumers are executed.
Logging the value can be used to verify the state after ifPresent has executed.
